translation.en: I got you, Sensei. Stay with me.
translation.zh: ‎我扶着你 老师 撑住

translation.en: You're a life saver, Casey Jones.
translation.zh: ‎你救了我的命 凯西琼斯

translation.en: I learned from the best. Come on, we're almost there.
translation.zh: ‎名师出高徒嘛 加油 就快到了

translation.en: Bad doggies!
Impeccable timing, little brother. Very dramatic.
translation.zh: ‎时机无可挑剔 老弟 戏剧性十足

translation.en: Help him, Michelangelo. He's hurt bad.
translation.zh: ‎快 帮帮他 米开朗琪罗 他伤得很重

translation.en: That's it. The resistance failed. The Krang won.
translation.zh: ‎结束了 抵抗失败 朗格人赢了

translation.en: But… but it isn't over.
We've still got a ninja's greatest weapon…
hope.
That and a badass mystic warrior.
translation.zh: ‎那个加上一个狂拽炫酷的神秘战士

translation.en: Mikey, we need a time gateway.
translation.zh: ‎麦奇 我们需要一个时间通道

translation.en: It'll take everything I have.
I know, but this is our last chance.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 但这是我们最后的机会了

translation.en: It's our only chance.
-Wait, what's going on? Where is he going? -Casey, listen.
translation.zh:
‎-等等 怎么回事？他要去哪里？
‎-凯西 听着

translation.en: The Krang first came to our planet through a mystic doorway.
translation.zh:
‎朗格人最初就是通过一道神秘之门
‎来我们星球的

translation.en: The key that opened the doorway looked like this.
Why are you telling me this?
Because Mikey's about to send you back in time
to the day that the key was stolen.
Wait, he's gonna what?
The people who stole that key opened the doorway for the Krang.
translation.zh: ‎偷钥匙的人帮朗格人打开了大门

translation.en: You have to find it before that happens.
Find the key, stop the Krang.
-But, Sensei-- -Say it!
"Find the key, stop the Krang."
I don't want to lose you.
Casey, it's not about me.
They found us!
Mikey!
Master Michelangelo, no! You're gonna--
translation.zh: ‎米开朗琪罗大师 不要！你会…

translation.en: Casey…
when you're done saving the world, do me a favor.
translation.zh: ‎等你拯救完世界 帮我个忙

translation.en: Grab a slice!
-[cars honking] -Where…
I made it?
All right, Casey, here we go. Find the key, stop the Krang.
translation.zh:
‎好了 凯西 来吧
‎找到钥匙 阻止朗格人

translation.en: ♪ Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles ♪
Easy does it, Leo.
You've got this.
Concentrate.
The whole world is counting on you…
to break the pizza box stack record!
One-hundred, twenty-five boxes!
They say it couldn't be done, but look who's doing it, moi.
translation.zh:
‎大家都说这是不可能的挑战
‎但看看谁正在完成它啊 Moi（我）

translation.en: That's Spanish for Leo.
Go ahead, my non-lingual friend, count your unhatched fowl.
translation.zh:
‎继续吧 我缺乏语言天赋的朋友
‎你就盲目乐观吧

translation.en: My record stands until you reach the top,
translation.zh: ‎在你到达顶峰前 我仍是纪录保持者

translation.en: which, according to my calculations of wind speed,
barometric pressure, and dew point, is highly unlikely. What?
translation.zh:
‎气压、以及露点的计算
‎成功的可能性极低 什么？

translation.en: According to my calculations,
as long as you believe in yourself, you can do anything!
translation.zh: ‎只要相信自己 一切皆有可能！

translation.en: Thanks, little brother. No one believes in himself more than me.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 老弟 没人比我更有自信了

translation.en: Leo!
Leo! Leo! Leo! Leo! Leo!
Leo! Leo! Leo! Leo! Leo!
-Yeah! [chuckles] I am Leo! -Yeah, baby!
translation.zh:
‎-耶！我是里奥！
‎-太棒了 宝贝！

translation.en: [Raph] There you are.
I've been looking all over for you guys.
Raph, guess who just broke the record?
translation.zh: ‎拉夫 你猜谁刚刚打破了记录？

translation.en: What? You did? How many did you-- [grunts]
Stop distracting Raph! We were supposed to be training--
translation.zh:
‎不要再分心了 拉夫！
‎我们本应该在训练的…

translation.en: Ta-ta-ta-ta-ta. Hold that thought.
Donnie?
Donnie?
You, sir, have bested me. Mazel.
translation.zh: ‎先生 你成功超越了我 恭喜！

translation.en: -Ahem? -Ahem?
Leo. Leo.
Leo! Leo!
Stop it!
Leo, we have work to do, and you dragged him out here for this?
translation.zh:
‎里奥 我们还有事要做
‎而你为了这事就把他拽来这儿？

translation.en: Training, record-breaking. The choice was clear.
translation.zh: ‎训练 打破记录 选哪个很明显啦

translation.en: [Raph sighs] Dang it, Leo. Everything's not about you.
translation.zh: ‎要命 里奥 世界不是围着你在转的

translation.en: When are you gonna grow up and start acting like a hero?
translation.zh:
‎你什么时候才能成熟点
‎有点英雄的样子？

translation.en: And there it is. Gentlemen…
-What was that? What are you guys doing? -A little game I invented.
translation.zh:
‎-什么情况？你们在做什么？
‎-我发明的一个小游戏

translation.en: Every time you say "heroes," we take a bite of pizza.
translation.zh:
‎只要你一说“英雄”
‎我们就吃一口披萨

translation.en: I don't say "heroes" that often!
translation.zh: ‎我说“英雄”的频率才没那么高！

translation.en: Leo!
So what if I say he-- that word a lot.
translation.zh: ‎就算我经常说英…那个词又能怎样

translation.en: It's a good word. We need to be that word.
translation.zh: ‎那是个好词 我们需要成为那个词

translation.en: Relax, Raph. We've got this hero thing wired.
translation.zh:
‎放松点 拉夫 我们已经具备
‎成为英雄的条件啦

translation.en: I mean, our ninjocity is off the charts.
We've got some kickin' mystic weapons.
And do I need to remind you who has four shells and defeated the Shredder?
translation.zh:
‎需要我提醒你 是谁
‎用四枚炮弹打败了施莱德吗？

translation.en: -[Leo] Hey. -[Raph] Leo!
You just don't get it.
-[beeps] -Huh? What is all that-- That's me.
Looks like we have a 317-39.4 in progress!
Oh, come on!
Has nobody read Donnie's Big Book of Bad Guy Codes? Nobody?
translation.zh:
‎你们没人看过多尼的
‎《坏人代码大全》吗？都没看？

translation.en: -Nope. -Never gonna happen.
We did it! We got the whatcha-ma-hoosie-doodle!
translation.zh:
‎成功啦！我们拿到
‎梦寐以求之不得的东西啦！

translation.en: Of course we did.
Nothing can stop Supervillain Warren Stone
translation.zh: ‎什么也无法阻止超级大反派沃伦斯通

translation.en: and his conjuring compatriot, Hypno-Potamus!
translation.zh: ‎和他变戏法的伙伴 河马催眠师！

translation.en: There they are! Okay, here's the plan--
translation.zh: ‎他们来了！好了 计划是这样的…

translation.en: Raph, relax. Who needs a plan when we got crazy cool mystic powers?
translation.zh:
‎拉夫 别紧张 有这么酷炫的神秘力量
‎谁还需要计划啊？

translation.en: Leo!
Come on, swords, it's portal time!
translation.zh: ‎来吧 宝剑 现在是传送门时间！

translation.en: I'll see you guys later after I save the day! Buh-buh-bye!
translation.zh: ‎等我拯救完世界再见咯！回见您呐！

translation.en: Stop! We need to work together!
Wellington Sunday! It's those pesky Turtles.
translation.zh: ‎我勒个去！是那些讨厌的乌龟

translation.en: License and registration.
Oh, I'm sorry, mate. I must have left it in my other jacket.
translation.zh:
‎抱歉 老兄 我肯定是
‎把它们落在外套包里了

translation.en: Leo! Ah!
Leo, we're coming.
Don't worry. I got 'em right where I want 'em. [moans]
translation.zh: ‎别担心 一切尽在我掌握之中

translation.en: Doesn't look that way to me. Donnie, Mikey, Maneuver 12.
translation.zh: ‎我看着可不像 多尼 麦奇 12技

translation.en: -On it! -Ha!
Whip-o-rama!
Prepare to be Donnie'd by my mystic tech!
translation.zh: ‎准备好被我的神秘科技打败吧！

translation.en: Oh boy.
Okay, creeps, hand over the stolen thingy!
translation.zh: ‎好了 怪物 把偷的东西交出来吧！

translation.en: Oh no.
That's gotta be what they stole!
translation.zh: ‎那一定就是他们偷走的东西了！

translation.en: I got it!
With those clumsy hands? [chuckles] No, I got this one.
translation.zh: ‎靠你那笨手笨脚？不 还是我来吧

translation.en: Oh, you portal-chopped him!
"Portal-chopped," I like it. Maybe my new catchphrase?
translation.zh:
‎“传送门斩”我喜欢
‎也许可以成为我的新潮语？

translation.en: Okay, let's see how it fits. "You've been portal chopped!"
translation.zh:
‎好了 我们来看看适不适合
‎“你们被传送门斩了！”

translation.en: [Foot Lieutenant] Uh-uh-uh-uh. I'll be taking this.
The Foot Clan?
Finally, after all these centuries, this is ours.
translation.zh: ‎经过这么多个世纪 它终于归我们了

translation.en: Yes, well, of course, thanks to us, delivered safe and sound.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 当然 多亏了我们 安全送达

translation.en: No problemo, partner.
Hey, just quietly, are we partners? We are partners, yeah?
translation.zh:
‎嘿 先静静 我们是搭档吗？
‎我们是搭档哦？

translation.en: Oh man, that thing must be dangerous if the Foot Clan wants it.
translation.zh:
‎天啊 如果那是脚帮想要得到的东西
‎那它一定很危险

translation.en: Ya think?
Huh? What?
[Raph] I clearly said, "I got it." Everybody heard me say, "I got it."
translation.zh:
‎我说得很清楚了：“让我来”
‎大家都听到我说“让我来”了

translation.en: Yeah, but I got it with style.
translation.zh: ‎话虽如此 但我的姿势比较帅

translation.en: [Raph] But you didn't get it!
You lost it, and now we've got a Foot Clan situation, Leo.
translation.zh:
‎你失手了 而现在
‎我们要面对脚帮这个大麻烦了 里奥

translation.en: What's it gonna take for you to be serious, Leo?
translation.zh: ‎你要怎样才能认真一点啊 里奥？

translation.en: And end up with a worry line between my eyes like you?
translation.zh:
‎然后变得像你这样
‎两眼之间皱出个川字来？

translation.en: No, no, no, I do not want a Raph chasm.
translation.zh: ‎不 我可不想弄个拉夫川谷在脸上

translation.en: "Chasm"?
You know, valley, gorge, crevasse.
translation.zh: ‎你懂的 就是山谷、峡谷、裂缝

translation.en: The only reason I have a chasm is I have to worry about you bozos 24/7.
translation.zh:
‎我会长出川谷来 那都是因为
‎我时刻都在替你们这些笨蛋担惊受怕

translation.en: You just don't get it, Leo.
I'm the oldest here.
I'm responsible for keeping us safe
and making sure we can handle anything that comes our way.
translation.zh: ‎并确保我们能够应对一切状况

translation.en: 'Cause if I don't, you could all end up dead.
translation.zh:
‎因为如果我不这样
‎你们都可能会没命的

translation.en: Sorry, I missed that.
Can you repeat everything from… well, everything?
translation.zh: ‎你能重复一遍吗 嗯…从头到尾？

translation.en: No wonder you always want to train. You really need the practice.
translation.zh:
‎难怪你总想着要训练啦
‎你确实需要练习一下了

translation.en: Let him go, Mikey.
Wait! No!
Boys! Stop this arguing!
But, Dad, Leo keeps--
translation.zh: ‎可是 爸爸 里奥一直…

translation.en: No more.
You are a team. You are brothers.
translation.zh: ‎你们是一个团队 你们是好兄弟

translation.en: And most importantly, you are too loud!
translation.zh: ‎最重要的是 你们太吵了！

translation.en: I cannot hear my TV show!
Tristan finally proposed to Annabelle, but did she say yes?
translation.zh:
‎崔斯坦终于向安娜贝尔求婚了
‎可她有没有答应呢？

translation.en: I don't know because of you!
Be the ninjas I taught you to be,
translation.zh: ‎拿出点忍者样来 别辜负我的教诲

translation.en: respectful and quiet!
Sorry. Excuse me.
Hey, how am I supposed to find this thing?
translation.zh: ‎我要怎么才能找到那东西啊？

translation.en: So many people.
How am I gonna save them all, Sensei?
translation.zh: ‎我要如何拯救他们所有人呢 老师？

translation.en: I really wish you were here.
Wait, you are!
I just need to find you.
April.
She'll know.
Hi, professor. Do you have a sec?
translation.zh: ‎嗨 教授 你有时间吗？

translation.en: Are you even in this class?
I'm April O'Neil, journalism major.
translation.zh: ‎我是爱普利尔奥尼尔 新闻系的

translation.en: I write for the Eastlaird University Daily News.
translation.zh: ‎我给《东莱尔大学每日新闻》撰稿

translation.en: Maybe I could get some shots of you at the whiteboard for a story?
translation.zh:
‎也许我可以在白板那儿
‎给你拍几张照片 写篇报道？

translation.en: Oh! Of course.
-[farts] -So, uh, what… what should I do?
You know, just write something sciencey.
I actually have the perfect equation for your article.
translation.zh:
‎我其实有个完美的公式
‎可供你写文章

translation.en: Now a few where you're staring thoughtfully at your work.
translation.zh:
‎现在再来几张
‎你盯着白板若有所思的照片

translation.en: [Professor] Oh, I always stare intently at my equations.
translation.zh: ‎我总是专心地盯着我的各种公式

translation.en: Especially this one.
You know, I think I should put on my lab coat.
translation.zh: ‎话说 我觉得我应该穿上我的实验袍

translation.en: -Look at it! -Oh! Okay.
You know, I could probably stare at this equation all day.
translation.zh:
‎要知道 我大概可以一整天
‎都看着这个公式

translation.en: This is April O'Neil, investigative reporter, Eastlaird University Daily News.
translation.zh:
‎我是爱普利尔奥尼尔
‎《东莱尔大学每日新闻》调查记者

translation.en: For years, this college shot down rumors that a foreign government
translation.zh:
‎多年来 这所大学一直
‎极力否认有国外政府支付

translation.en: is paying them millions
to develop a super-toxic herbicidal deforestation bomb.
translation.zh: ‎用来研发毒性极强的除草毁林炸弹

translation.en: Those rumors end today because I'm about to blow the lid off Big Chem.
translation.zh:
‎这些谣言将在今天终结
‎因为我将会曝光这背后的化学工厂

translation.en: April O'Neil.
-Ooh. This stuff looks nasty. -[shutter clicking]
-Hey! Who's there? -[gasps]
Evidence, baby.
Oh boy.
Well, it's a good thing video ain't the only thing I took.
April! Yes!
-Commander O'Neil-- -Catlike reflex!
What's the matter with you, creeping up on a person in the dark?
translation.zh:
‎你是怎么回事 乌漆嘛黑的
‎偷偷靠近别人？

translation.en: What the…
And then I saw that picture and I brought him here.
translation.zh:
‎然后我看到了那张照片
‎于是就把他带过来了

translation.en: Sensei?
It's you!
It's all of you! Together!
I never thought I'd see you again! I'm so happy I could hug you! [groans]
translation.zh:
‎我以为再也见不到你们了！
‎我好高兴 我还能拥抱你们！

translation.en: Who are you, and why do you have a picture of us?
translation.zh: ‎你是谁？你为什么会有我们的照片？

translation.en: Yeah, who took this? 'Cause I look great.
translation.zh: ‎对啊 照片谁拍的？因为我帅呆了

translation.en: What's your favorite pizza? 'Cause I'm ordering right now.
translation.zh:
‎你最喜欢什么口味的披萨？
‎因为我现在要下单了

translation.en: And why are you wearing genius-built apparel?
translation.zh: ‎另外 你为什么穿着天才假面装？

translation.en: That's trademarked!
Grappling hook!
What's going on?
-[Mikey] He's trying to escape! -[grunts]
-Want me to knock him out again? -Let me.
Donnie? Donnie!
Oh, okay.
Wa… Wait, stop! I'm a friend. Let me explain.
translation.zh:
‎等一下 住手！我是你们朋友
‎听我解释

translation.en: Let's start over.
My name is Casey Jones, and the reason I have this photo
translation.zh: ‎我叫凯西琼斯 我有这张照片

translation.en: and your tech is because you gave it to me,
translation.zh:
‎以及你的技术服装 是因为
‎这些都是你们给我的

translation.en: but not yet, because I'm from…
translation.zh: ‎但现在还没有 因为我来自…

translation.en: the future!
This isn't a joke.
Please, if time travel is possible, future Donnie would have come back
translation.zh:
‎拜托 如果时间旅行可行的话
‎未来的多尼就会回来

translation.en: and already given me all the lottery numbers like we planned.
translation.zh:
‎把所有彩票号码告诉我了
‎就像我们计划好的那样

translation.en: It's true. I need you to believe me. Humanity depends on it.
translation.zh:
‎是真的 我需要你们相信我
‎这关系到人类的命运

translation.en: In the future, an alien race decimated the planet.
translation.zh:
‎在未来 一个外星种族
‎摧毁了这个星球

translation.en: We were hunted. We lived in caves. We ate leaves and rats.
translation.zh:
‎我们惨遭捕杀 住在洞穴里
‎以树叶和老鼠为食

translation.en: No offense.
None taken. We are delicious. [gulps]
I know how this sounds, but Master Leonardo gave me a mission.
translation.zh:
‎我知道这听起来很离谱
‎但里奥纳多大师给了我一个任务

translation.en: I do like how he calls me "Master."
Of course I do.
You are the greatest ninja the world has ever seen.
translation.zh: ‎你是史无前例 世上最伟大的忍者

translation.en: You told me to find the key and stop the Krang.
translation.zh: ‎是你让我找到钥匙 阻止朗格人

translation.en: "Aliens." Pfft.
Sure. This story just keeps getting better.
translation.zh: ‎当然啦 这个故事越来越精彩了

translation.en: Splints?
"The Krang"?
I have heard that name.
Powerful, barbaric creatures worshiped by the Foot Clan.
translation.zh: ‎为脚帮所敬奉的强大又野蛮的生物

translation.en: Legend says they came from the stars.
Ruthless, unmerciful, with one desire,
translation.zh: ‎冷酷无情、残暴不仁 唯一的渴望

translation.en: to enslave our world like so many before us.
translation.zh:
‎就是像之前的许多生物一样
‎奴役我们的世界

translation.en: All seemed lost,
until great mystic warriors forged a mighty weapon,
translation.zh:
‎直到伟大的神秘战士
‎锻造出了一个强大的武器

translation.en: a key that was used to lock them in a prison dimension beyond this realm.
translation.zh:
‎一把能将他们锁在位于本域之外
‎维度监狱之中的钥匙

translation.en: Over the centuries, the mystic key remained hidden
translation.zh: ‎几个世纪以来 为了保护人类

translation.en: to protect humankind and prevent the return of the Krang.
translation.zh:
‎防止朗格人重新回来
‎那把神秘的钥匙一直被隐藏着

translation.en: So…
Future boy is really from the future?
translation.zh: ‎未来小子真的是来自未来咯？

translation.en: Mind… [imitates explosion]
Someone finds the key! Today!
translation.zh: ‎有人找到了那把钥匙！就在今天！

translation.en: They steal it and use it to open a doorway and free the Krang!
translation.zh:
‎他们偷走了它 并用它打开了一扇门
‎释放了朗格人！

translation.en: That's why I came back, to find it first.
translation.zh: ‎所以我才会回来 为了先找到它

translation.en: Master Leonardo drew a picture on the back of that photo.
translation.zh:
‎里奥纳多大师在那照片背后
‎画出了它的样子

translation.en: So to stop the Krang,
all we have to do is find the key before it's stolen.
translation.zh:
‎我们要做的 就是在钥匙被偷走前
‎率先找到它

translation.en: What?
Yeah, did future handsome, amazing me tell you what to do
translation.zh:
‎嗯 未来那个帅气又无敌的我
‎有没有告诉你 如果

translation.en: in case that already happened?
'Cause that already happened.
Oh no, we're too late! [sighs]
No, we're not.
'Cause we know who has the key, the Foot Clan.
translation.zh: ‎因为我们知道是谁拿走了钥匙 脚帮

translation.en: Okay, we gotta find them before they use it,
translation.zh: ‎我们要在他们启用它之前找到他们

translation.en: and this time, we do it together!
translation.zh: ‎而这一次 我们要一起行动！

translation.en: Uh, can someone untie me now?
[Hypno-Potamus] Villain to villain, your hideout is a bit… lacking.
translation.zh:
‎坏人之间 有话直说
‎你的藏身之所有点…简陋

translation.en: Might I suggest some velvet, a fireplace,
translation.zh: ‎我建议弄点天鹅绒、一个壁炉、

translation.en: maybe a fuzzy white cat with a diamond necklace?
translation.zh:
‎也许再来只戴着钻石项链
‎毛茸茸的大白猫？

translation.en: Tonight, we liberate our masters from their dimensional prison.
translation.zh:
‎今晚 我们要将我们的大师们
‎从维度监狱中解救出来

translation.en: With this key,
we shall free them to lay waste to this world and enslave its people.
translation.zh:
‎我们将能够把他们释放出来
‎摧毁这个世界 奴役它的人民

translation.en: Ah, I thought we were just gonna rob a bank and be, you know, crime buddies.
translation.zh:
‎我以为我们只是要抢抢银行
‎你懂的 合伙儿犯罪啥的

translation.en: We shall follow the Krang as they lead the Foot Clan to glory!
translation.zh:
‎我们要追随朗格人
‎因为他们会带领脚帮走向辉煌！

translation.en: -[Leo] Bored. -[gasps]
You!
-Leo! -What?
I was waiting for a good spot to jump in, but they just kept blabbity-blab-ing.
translation.zh:
‎我本来想等一个合适的时机跳进去的
‎但他们一直絮絮叨叨说个不停

translation.en: There it is! That's the key.
Get them! Don't let them interfere with the ceremony!
translation.zh: ‎抓住他们！别让他们妨碍了仪式！

translation.en: No!
-It started! -[groans]
He's unlocking the doorway! We need to get up there right now!
translation.zh:
‎他正在开启大门！
‎我们现在就得过去！

translation.en: Casey, go. We've got you covered.
translation.zh: ‎凯西 去吧 我们掩护你

translation.en: [gasps] Oh no.
Oh no! They're here!
Then let's make sure their visit's short and sweet.
translation.zh:
‎那我们就让他们这次来访
‎短暂又美妙吧

translation.en: I'm finally free!
The people of this planet will pay for what they've done to me.
translation.zh:
‎这个星球上的人
‎将为他们对我所做的一切付出代价

translation.en: Welcome to Earth. I hope you don't enjoy your stay!
translation.zh:
‎欢迎来到地球 希望你在这里
‎度过一段不愉快的时光！

translation.en: Enough tricks!
Mikey! Donnie! No!
No…
Raph, what happened to our powers?
translation.zh: ‎拉夫 我们的力量怎么了？

translation.en: They… They're gone.
What did they do to us?
Brother, sister, join me.
translation.zh: ‎弟弟 小妹 加入我吧

translation.en: Time for us to finish remaking this universe in the image of Krang.
translation.zh:
‎是时候按照朗格人的蓝图
‎重塑这个世界了

translation.en: How I've waited for this day.
Indeed.
Brother, widen the portal and retrieve our ship, the Technodrome.
translation.zh:
‎弟弟 把传送门扩大一些
‎找回我们的飞船 技术场号

translation.en: Once it is here, this world will kneel before us.
translation.zh:
‎只要它来到这里
‎世界就将臣服在我们脚下

translation.en: Oh, if you two don't mind, I haven't killed anything in ages.
translation.zh:
‎如果你不介意的话
‎我已经很久没开过杀戒了

translation.en: No!
Retreat!
Retreat? We don't retreat!
Leo, for once, listen to me. They're too powerful and Dad's hurt.
translation.zh:
‎里奥 你就听我一次吧
‎他们太强大了 而且爸爸受伤了

translation.en: You don't understand.
If we don't close that doorway, it's only gonna get worse.
translation.zh:
‎如果我们不把那道门关上
‎情况只会变得更糟

translation.en: Raph?
I'm not gonna argue with you, Leo! Donnie, escape pods, now!
translation.zh:
‎里奥 这事没商量！
‎多尼 逃生舱 快！

translation.en: You don't have to tell me twice!
Sensei, we need to get that key!
translation.zh: ‎老师 我们得拿到那把钥匙！

translation.en: -[Leo grunts] -Leo!
Raph?
Raph, wait, no.
Wait, Raph! Raph! No, Raph! Raph! No, Raph!
translation.zh: ‎等等 拉夫！拉夫！不要 拉夫！

translation.en: [computer] Escape pods incoming.
[computer] Congratulations on surviving, fam.
translation.zh: ‎恭喜你们逃出生天 家人们

translation.en: -Huh? -[grunting]
[Donnie] Oh, I hate that.
Everyone okay? Anybody hurt?
How did we get here?
Donnie pods. We've never had to use those before.
translation.zh:
‎多尼逃生舱
‎我们之前从来没有用过它们

translation.en: So, how would everyone rate their escape experience?
translation.zh:
‎那么 大家对各自的逃生体验
‎有何评价呢？

translation.en: "Very satisfied," "Very, very satisfied," "Extremely satisfied"?
translation.zh:
‎“非常满意”、“非常非常满意”、
‎“无与伦比的满意”？

translation.en: -Donnie! -Sorry. Sorry.
Data collection calms me down.
Splints.
This is terrible! Why did we leave?
translation.zh: ‎简直糟透了！我们为什么要离开啊？

translation.en: In case you didn't notice, we were getting our butts kicked!
translation.zh:
‎以防你没有注意到
‎我们被人打得屁滚尿流了！

translation.en: -[strains] -But my mission was to stop them!
Now, the Krang are using that key
translation.zh: ‎现在 朗格人正用那把钥匙

translation.en: to bring in something that will destroy the world.
translation.zh: ‎把一个将会摧毁世界的东西带过来

translation.en: We lost.
-Where's my other pod? -Where's Raph?
Ah, did you know this would happen? Why didn't you tell me?
translation.zh:
‎你是不是早知道会这样？
‎你为什么不早说？

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -Easy!
-Leo, what's going on? Where's Raph? -Leo, what happened to Raph?
translation.zh:
‎-里奥 怎么了？拉夫去哪了？
‎-里奥 拉夫出了什么事？

translation.en: [Splinter] Leonardo?
They…
They got him.
You left Raph?
He left himself.
He used his pod to save me, all because I went after this stupid thing.
translation.zh:
‎他用他的逃生舱救了我
‎只因为我去抢这个破玩意儿了

translation.en: You got it! Nice.
"Nice"? They captured Raph!
He's from the future! He knew this would happen!
translation.zh: ‎他是未来人！他早就知道会这样！

translation.en: No, I didn't. This didn't happen in my time.
translation.zh:
‎不 我不知道 在我的时代
‎这事并没有发生

translation.en: We changed the past, and you got the key.
translation.zh: ‎我们改变了过去 你拿到了钥匙

translation.en: That means there's still a chance to stop them.
translation.zh: ‎也就是说 我们还有机会阻止他们

translation.en: -No, we have to save Raph. Come on. -Leo, wait.
translation.zh:
‎-不 我们必须救出拉夫 走吧
‎-里奥 等一下

translation.en: If you won't come, I'll go myself.
translation.zh: ‎如果你们不一起来 我就自己去

translation.en: -We've lost our mystic powers. -We don't have a plan!
translation.zh:
‎-我们失去了我们的神秘力量
‎-我们还没制定计划！

translation.en: We don't need a plan.
"I'm the greatest ninja the world's ever seen," his words.
translation.zh:
‎“我是史无前例 世上最伟大的忍者”
‎他说的

translation.en: Shouldn't we talk about this
before we run off all half-cocked, willy-nilly, pell-mell?
translation.zh:
‎噼里啪啦 稀里哗啦前
‎不该先商量一下吗？

translation.en: I keep being told I'm doing this hero thing wrong.
translation.zh: ‎大家一直说 我不该瞎逞英雄

translation.en: But I got the key, didn't I?
translation.zh: ‎但我拿到了钥匙 不是吗？

translation.en: I get results, so now we're doing it my way.
translation.zh:
‎我取得了成果
‎所以现在我们得按我的方法做事

translation.en: My son, listen to your team.
translation.zh: ‎儿子 听从你团队的意见

translation.en: This is not about you.
They made it about me when they took my brother.
translation.zh:
‎从他们带走我哥那时起
‎这就是我个人的事

translation.en: Trust me, I got this.
Donnie, you're driving.
What do we do with this?
We can't just bring it with us, but we can't just leave it behind.
translation.zh:
‎我们不能随身带着它
‎但也不能就这么把它留下

translation.en: Then we should destroy it.
Splints and I will stay here and take care of business.
translation.zh: ‎斯普林兹和我会留在这里处理这件事

translation.en: Thanks, Commander O'Neil.
"Commander"? I like the sound of that.
Oh, look at it.
-[groans] -Disgusting.
-[grunts] -Try looking in a mirror.
Ugh, it's talking at me.
I'm going to rip out its tongue.
[Krang 1] Forgive my sister.
She's got a bit of a temper.
And being in prison for a thousand years hasn't done her any favors.
translation.zh: ‎关在监狱里一千年 她也不好受

translation.en: You're not human.
What are you?
Let me go, and I'll show you.
You're more powerful than the people of this planet,
translation.zh: ‎你比这个星球上的人更加强大

translation.en: yet you defend them.
-Why? -It's my duty.
A word used by the weak.
Many planets before yours have spoken of duty.
translation.zh: ‎在你们之前的很多星球都提到过使命

translation.en: They too have been consumed by the Krang.
And now our glorious crusade continues
translation.zh: ‎如今 我们的光荣征程仍在继续

translation.en: to restore the natural order of things.
The strong will devour the weak.
Last I checked,
we weren't the ones locked in a prison dimension for a thousand years.
translation.zh:
‎在维度监狱里被关了一千年的人
‎可不是我们

translation.en: That's called "trash talk."
A rare misstep.
Once I retrieve the key from your comrades,
translation.zh: ‎一旦我从你的同伴手里重新夺回钥匙

translation.en: I will bring forth the mighty Technodrome,
translation.zh: ‎我就会把威猛的技术场号带过来

translation.en: and you will witness the true power of the Krang.
translation.zh: ‎你们将见识到朗格人真正的力量

translation.en: Now, where have they taken my key?
translation.zh: ‎快说 他们把我的钥匙带去哪里了？

translation.en: It won't tell you anything.
Let me kill it.
Lady brain face here is right. I'm not telling you jack.
translation.zh:
‎这位脑子脸女士说得对
‎我什么都不会告诉你的

translation.en: You don't have to tell me.
I'll look myself.
There it is.
They always do it the hard way.
Our brother and I will secure a location for the dimensional doorway.
translation.zh:
‎我弟弟和我将负责寻找地点
‎打开维度之门

translation.en: Take these soldiers and retrieve me my key.
translation.zh: ‎带上这些战士 把我的钥匙找回来

translation.en: We live to serve.
You will serve me whether you live or not.
translation.zh: ‎不论是生是死 你们都将效忠于我

translation.en: [Casey Jones] What is this thing?
[Donnie laughs] Hold on to your gluteus maximi!
The Turtle Tank, baby! It's how we roll in the past.
translation.zh:
‎这是神龟坦克 宝贝！
‎在过去 我们就是这么做事的

translation.en: I mean, the present. I mean…
translation.zh: ‎我是说 现在 我的意思是…

translation.en: -Ugh! Time travel's confusing. -They're on the move.
translation.zh:
‎-时间旅行让人晕头转向
‎-他们开始移动了

translation.en: According to the subcutaneous tracker I put on Raph--
translation.zh: ‎根据我在拉夫身上放的皮下追踪器…

translation.en: Wait, does that mean you put trackers on all of us?
translation.zh:
‎慢着 也就是说
‎大家身上都有追踪器？

translation.en: "No"?
No, of course I did… n't.
Based on their trajectory, they're headed…
translation.zh: ‎据轨迹显示 他们正在前往…

translation.en: …to the tallest building in the city.
That's right, Metro Tower.
I heard the story so many times as a kid, but I never thought…
translation.zh:
‎我小时候听过很多次这个故事
‎但我从没想过…

translation.en: "And behold,
from their perch atop New York City, the Krang ripped open the sky itself."
translation.zh:
‎在纽约市的最高处
‎朗格人撕裂了天空”

translation.en: "What came out was terror,
and what rained down upon us was worse than death."
translation.zh: ‎身上滴落之物 比死亡更糟”

translation.en: They told that to kids?
Man, the future is harsh.
I'm not gonna let that happen.
We need to get into Metro Tower without being spotted.
translation.zh: ‎我们要神不知鬼不觉地潜入地铁大厦

translation.en: We'll take the subway tunnels.
Subway tunnels don't offer much in the way of an escape if we need it.
translation.zh:
‎万一有需要 地铁隧道里
‎可没有太多的逃生路径

translation.en: -Are you sure about this? -Yeah, maybe we should--
translation.zh:
‎-你确定吗？
‎-对啊 也许我们应该…

translation.en: Guys, we're doing it my way. Remember?
translation.zh: ‎各位 我们要按我的方法做 记得吗？

translation.en: Prepare the site so we may bring forth the Technodrome.
translation.zh:
‎准备好场地
‎以便我们把技术场号带进来

translation.en: Yes, brother.
See? Smooth sailing. We'll have Raph in no time.
translation.zh:
‎看吧？顺风顺水
‎我们很快就能找到拉夫了

translation.en: I hope he's okay.
How are we gonna find him once we get there?
translation.zh: ‎我们到那里以后要怎么找到他？

translation.en: I have a lot of questions regarding "once we get there."
translation.zh:
‎关于“我们到那里以后”
‎我有非常多的疑问

translation.en: Relax. We'll do what we always do. Ninja in, ninja their faces, ninja out.
translation.zh:
‎放轻松 各位 我们就像平常那样
‎忍术进、忍术碾压、忍术出

translation.en: That's exactly how you freed all those families from the Krang labor camp.
translation.zh:
‎你当初就是这么把那些家庭
‎从朗格劳改营里救出来的

translation.en: Yeah, that sounds like me.
translation.zh: ‎没错 听起来像我的作风

translation.en: In the future, you guys are beyond amazing.
translation.zh: ‎在未来 你们全都变得卓越超群

translation.en: The mystic powers you're able to harness are on a whole other level.
translation.zh:
‎你们能够驾驭的神秘力量
‎完全达到了另一个级别

translation.en: Of course! What about my future?
I'm expecting big things for me.
translation.zh: ‎别让我失望 我对自己期望很高

translation.en: How many Nobel prizes do I have? Don't tell me. I wanna be surprised.
translation.zh:
‎我赢了多少个诺贝尔奖？
‎不 别告诉我 我喜欢惊喜

translation.en: Donnie, you were the most brilliant, innovative mind of all time.
translation.zh:
‎多尼 你是有史以来最聪明
‎最富有创新能力的人

translation.en: I'm shocked, I am. Go on, continue to meet my expectations.
translation.zh:
‎我好震惊 真的 继续
‎继续印证我的预期

translation.en: What do I do in the future?
You are the most powerful mystic warrior the world has ever known.
translation.zh: ‎你是世界上最强大的神秘战士

translation.en: With those two hands, you sent me back in time.
translation.zh: ‎用这两只手 你把我送回了过去

translation.en: Actually, there is something I should tell you.
translation.zh: ‎其实 有件事我应该告诉你们的

translation.en: [Turtle Tank] Auto brake engaged.
Think we're in the right place?
Looks like the Metro Tower station is on the other side of those vines.
translation.zh:
‎地铁大厦看起来应该是在
‎那些藤蔓的另一边

translation.en: Great. Let's hoof it.
Through the disgusting, drippy slime jungle?
translation.zh: ‎穿过那些恶心的、滴着黏液的丛林？

translation.en: I know. I know. Leo knows best,
but I'm not sharing my hand sanitizer.
translation.zh: ‎但我可不会分享我的搓手液

translation.en: [Leo] Feeling a lack of rush in this rush hour, right?
translation.zh: ‎高峰时段感觉不太堵呢 是吧？

translation.en: [Donnie] I don't know, Leo. Something feels…
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 里奥 感觉有些…

translation.en: off.
Don't worry. I won't let us die. I'm a mystic warrior.
translation.zh:
‎别担心 我不会害死大伙儿的
‎我是个神秘战士

translation.en: "I feel better already," he said without a hint of sarcasm.
translation.zh:
‎“我感觉好多了”
‎他不带丝毫讽刺地说道

translation.en: Look, the stairs.
Sneaking in from below was the right move. Those slimeballs will never see us coming.
translation.zh:
‎从下面偷偷潜入是正确之举
‎那些粘液球绝对不会发现我们的

translation.en: [April] We tried to jackhammer it, flamethrower it, pour acid on it…
translation.zh:
‎我们试过用手提钻钻它
‎用喷火器烧它 往上面倒强酸…

translation.en: I thought lasers cut everything! How did that not work?
translation.zh:
‎我以为镭射枪什么都能切断啊！
‎怎么会没用呢？

translation.en: There's not even a scratch!
Maybe it was your aim.
Maybe your big rat head got in the way!
translation.zh: ‎也许是你的大老鼠脑袋挡着我了！

translation.en: Mmm, I'll show you, fat rat head.
Okay, deep breaths.
You said some things, I said some things.
translation.zh: ‎你说了几句 我说了几句

translation.en: Maybe we should just get back to saving the world.
translation.zh: ‎也许我们该继续拯救世界了

translation.en: What's next?
This cannot be good.
April O'Neil!
[Krang 2] Come back here!
-[tires screeching] -[Splinter] Faster.
Faster!
I knew this was a bad idea.
Leo, there's too many. We should go back.
translation.zh: ‎里奥 敌人太多了 我们应该撤回去

translation.en: No, we're gonna get to those stairs.
translation.zh: ‎不行 我们必须到楼梯那儿去

translation.en: Leo, we're not gonna make it! We have to turn back.
translation.zh:
‎里奥 我们不可能成功的！
‎我们必须撤回去

translation.en: We push forward, get Raph, that's final.
translation.zh: ‎我们往前推进 救回拉夫 这才算完

translation.en: Mystic hands!
Donnie! Mikey!
Oh no, Donnie, your soft shell! You're exposed!
translation.zh:
‎不 多尼！你的软壳！
‎你失去保护了！

translation.en: We gotta find shelter!
Oh, oh, keep it down, Vomitello!
Oh. Keep it down, daddy!
Run, insects, but you can't escape!
translation.zh: ‎跑吧 小虫子 但你们逃不掉的！

translation.en: [sighs] Don't!
The key, human! Give it to me!
What did you do to me? What did you do to my face?
translation.zh:
‎你对我做了什么？
‎你对我的脸做了什么？

translation.en: I knew that stuff was nasty! I told y'all!
translation.zh:
‎我就知道那玩意儿很厉害！
‎我早就说嘛！

translation.en: Yes, yes, you're a genius. Let's go.
translation.zh: ‎好啦 你是个天才 我们走吧

translation.en: [April] Donnie, come in.
They found us. Where should we go? Donnie?
translation.zh:
‎他们找到我们了
‎我们该去哪里？多尼？

translation.en: [Donnie] We're trapped.
We are trapped in the subway under Metro Tower.
translation.zh: ‎我们被困在了地铁大厦下面的地铁里

translation.en: The tank is running on emergency power
translation.zh: ‎坦克已经在靠应急电源支撑了

translation.en: and is covered in some kind of Krang bio-growth.
translation.zh: ‎而且正被某种朗格生物覆盖着

translation.en: -I repeat-- -April, come quick!
We're getting squished!
We're on our way!
But, April, how will we get them out?
translation.zh:
‎但是 爱普利尔
‎我们要怎么把他们救出来？

translation.en: I've got an idea.
Yeesh. Remind me to never get on your bad side.
translation.zh: ‎记得提醒我永远不要和你为敌

translation.en: Casey! [moans]
Casey, you okay?
Donnie, Mikey, anybody?
What the heck was that?
Some kind of drippy, crazy Krang monster.
No, I mean you! Why weren't you listening to anybody?
translation.zh:
‎不 我是说你！
‎你为什么谁的话都不听啊？

translation.en: Because I was trying to get us into the building!
translation.zh:
‎因为我在努力把我们弄到
‎藤蔓对面的大楼里去！

translation.en: That sure worked out well.
I was doing everything right. How could it go wrong?
translation.zh:
‎我每一步都做对啦
‎怎么可能会出问题呢？

translation.en: Because you weren't listening to your team!
translation.zh: ‎因为你没有听取团队的意见！

translation.en: You don't have all the answers all the time!
translation.zh: ‎你不是总能知道所有的答案！

translation.en: I'm the greatest ninja the world's ever seen. You said that.
translation.zh:
‎但我是“史无前例
‎世上最伟大的忍者”这是你说的

translation.en: [sighs] I was wrong.
What?
You're impulsive, you're arrogant,
and you don't see that every decision you make could cost someone their life.
translation.zh:
‎而且你根本不明白 你做的每个决定
‎都可能会害别人送命

translation.en: You want to know what really happens to your brothers in the future?
translation.zh:
‎你真的想知道你的兄弟们
‎未来遭遇了什么吗？

translation.en: They die. Everybody dies fighting the Krang.
translation.zh:
‎他们死了
‎大家都在和朗格人的对抗中死了

translation.en: The world needs Master Leonardo.
translation.zh: ‎这个世界需要里奥纳多大师

translation.en: And all we got is this guy.
We have an update on the strange situation at Metro Tower.
translation.zh:
‎我们收到地铁大厦异常状况的
‎最新消息

translation.en: All contact has been lost with those inside the building,
translation.zh: ‎外界与大楼内部的所有联系皆已中断

translation.en: and conflicting reports suggest
something is barricading entrance for emergency personnel.
translation.zh: ‎有东西阻碍了紧急救援人员进入大厦

translation.en: Fools.
These creatures should welcome the power of the Krang.
translation.zh: ‎这些生物应该迎接朗格之力的到来

translation.en: You on the rooftop! Stop and surrender immediately!
translation.zh: ‎屋顶上的人！站住别动 立即投降！

translation.en: [reporter] We've got eyes on the roof top where the police are confronting--
translation.zh: ‎我们收到了屋顶的画面 警方正与…

translation.en: What is that?
You may begin. [roars]
[man] Look out!
-[strains] -[Leo] Look,
I know I'm not the Leo you knew in the future, and maybe I never will be.
translation.zh:
‎我知道我不是你未来认识的那个里奥
‎也许我永远成不了他

translation.en: This whole time I was sure my family needed me,
translation.zh: ‎我一直以为 是我的家人们需要我

translation.en: but the truth is I need them.
If we're gonna survive this, we have to do it together.
translation.zh: ‎如果我们想要成功 就必须团结协作

translation.en: [Turtle Tank] Hull integrity, 4%. Breach imminent. Good luck.
translation.zh:
‎车体完整性 4%
‎损毁迫在眉睫 祝您好运

translation.en: Whew, good. We have an imminent amount of time.
translation.zh:
‎太好了 我们还有
‎迫在眉睫的一大堆时间

translation.en: "Imminent" means "soon," Mikey.
translation.zh: ‎“迫在眉睫”的意思是“很快” 麦奇

translation.en: Don't worry. I'll save us with my mystic hands.
translation.zh:
‎别担心
‎我会用我的神秘之手拯救我们

translation.en: Casey must have been wrong about me.
This is it, Donnie.
We're gonna get crushed!
-[April] Knock-knock! -April?
Anyone order a rescue?
Boom goes the herbicide!
April!
You saved us!
Uncomfortable with emotion!
Where is Leo? And, uh, Future Boy?
translation.zh: ‎里奥在哪里？还有那个未来小子？

translation.en: Somewhere in there.
[Krang 2] Faster! They're this way.
I can smell them. [laughs]
-[screaming] -She found us! We gotta move now.
translation.zh: ‎她找到我们了！我们得快离开

translation.en: Oh man, is this what the future looks like?
translation.zh: ‎天啊 这就是未来的样子吗？

translation.en: Nope, the future is worse. Much worse.
translation.zh: ‎不 未来比这还糟 糟糕得多

translation.en: Donnie, Mikey, do you read me?
translation.zh: ‎多尼 麦奇 你们能听到吗？

translation.en: [Donnie] Come in, Leo.
Donnie, where are you?
We've extracted from the subway and are ascending a staircase.
translation.zh: ‎我们已经从地铁里出来了 正在上楼

translation.en: I'm getting a lot of interference, but if you hold still,
translation.zh:
‎我受到了很多干扰
‎但如果你待着别动

translation.en: I can triangulate your position using a complex geo-location algorithm.
translation.zh:
‎我可以用复杂的地理定位法
‎三角定位出你的位置

translation.en: -[Casey Jones] Uh, Donnie? -Odd numbers, primes, no… almost.
translation.zh:
‎-多尼？
‎-奇怪的数字 素数 不…快了

translation.en: -Almost! -[Splinter clears throat]
Ugh. I never get to use my algorithm.
translation.zh: ‎我总是没机会使用我的算法

translation.en: Man, I am so glad you guys aren't dead.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 我好高兴你们没有死掉

translation.en: Ditto.
Okay, before this gets too mushy, we need to locate Raph.
translation.zh:
‎好了 在过份多愁善感之前
‎我们得先找到拉夫

translation.en: Can you tell me if he's in the building?
translation.zh: ‎多尼 能告诉我他还在楼里吗？

translation.en: Bet your momma's subatomic particles I can.
translation.zh: ‎用你妈妈的亚原子粒子打赌 必须的

translation.en: Got him! He's close.
He's almost on top of us.
Wait, he is on top of us.
[all] Raph!
Quick, cut him down, get him out of there.
translation.zh: ‎快 把他放下来 带他离开这里

translation.en: Hang on. We got you. Almost there.
translation.zh: ‎坚持住 我们找到你了 就快好了

translation.en: Raph?
Surprise.
What did you do to my brother?
Improved him.
Thank you for this. We will be putting it to good use.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 我们会好好利用它的

translation.en: Come, the world awaits destruction.
translation.zh: ‎来吧 世界还等着被摧毁呢

translation.en: Tear them apart!
We gotta move.
-Leo, move! [grunts] -No!
A shame our brethren didn't survive the prison dimension.
translation.zh:
‎可惜我们的同胞没能在
‎维度监狱里活下来

translation.en: Then again, their weakness has no place in my new Krang empire.
translation.zh:
‎但话又说回来 在我的新朗格王国里
‎可容不下那些弱者

translation.en: Open and bring unto this world
translation.zh: ‎打开大门 把朗格的强大力量

translation.en: the mighty power of Krang!
[radio] Warning! This is a warning!
…appears to be something falling from the sky--
translation.zh: ‎…好像有什么东西正从空中坠下…

translation.en: Begin!
[Mikey] What do we do now?
I fear we are lost. The Krang are too powerful.
translation.zh:
‎恐怕我们已经输了
‎朗格人太过强大了

translation.en: Maybe we could change the future some other way.
translation.zh: ‎也许我们还有别的方法可以改变未来

translation.en: Guys, it's time to face facts. We can't change the future.
translation.zh:
‎各位 该面对现实了
‎我们无法改变未来

translation.en: Says who?
Says the grandfather paradox, says physical determinism,
translation.zh: ‎祖父悖论说的 物理决定论说的

translation.en: says the space-time continuum.
Look, I didn't want it to be true, but…
translation.zh: ‎我也不希望这是真的 但…

translation.en: [sighs] …science.
That's it! Donnie's wrong.
The world is ending, yet the barbs continue.
translation.zh: ‎世界正在终结 但抨击仍在继续

translation.en: Don't you remember? We already did change the future.
translation.zh:
‎你们不记得了吗？
‎我们已经改变了未来

translation.en: Raph never got kidnapped and turned into a Krang zombie in your time.
translation.zh:
‎在你的时间里 拉夫没有被绑架
‎然后变成朗格僵尸

translation.en: -Right, Casey? -No, he didn't.
That means we did change the future! We're just in a different… [stammers]
translation.zh:
‎也就是说 我们确实改变了未来！
‎我们是在一个不同的…

translation.en: Bifurcated time branch?
Yes, yes, yes, that nerd thing.
translation.zh: ‎没错 就是这拗口的东西

translation.en: You know what that means, right? We still have hope!
translation.zh:
‎你们知道这意味着什么吧？
‎我们还有希望！

translation.en: A ninja's greatest weapon.
Hey, I like that!
[sighs] Look, I'm done thinking I have all the answers.
translation.zh:
‎听着 我已经不再觉得
‎自己无所不知了

translation.en: I don't know how to beat the Krang,
translation.zh: ‎我不知道该怎么战胜朗格人

translation.en: but I do know our future isn't written until we write it as a team.
translation.zh:
‎但我知道 除非我们一起书写
‎否则我们的未来就还未成定数

translation.en: So what do we got?
Maybe…
Maybe we don't have to beat them.
Can't we just send them back to the prison dimension?
translation.zh: ‎我们就不能把他们送回维度监狱吗？

translation.en: There's an idea! Donnie, what do those big, beautiful eyebrows have to say?
translation.zh:
‎这也是个办法！多尼
‎你那对绒绒乎乎的眉毛有何高见？

translation.en: If we got control of their ship, we could send it back through the portal.
translation.zh:
‎如果我们控制住他们的飞船
‎我们就能把它送回到传送门里面

translation.en: Yes! Yes! Now we're cooking. Who else?
translation.zh: ‎没错！我们开始有思路了 还有谁？

translation.en: If someone on the ground can get to that key…
translation.zh: ‎如果地面上有人能拿到那把钥匙…

translation.en: We can close the doorway.
And then bye-bye Krang forever, baby!
translation.zh: ‎然后就能永远跟朗格人说再见了！

translation.en: Exactly. What do you say, Donnie? You ready to fly a space ship?
translation.zh:
‎没错 你怎么看 多尼？
‎你准备好要驾驶宇宙飞船了吗？

translation.en: Literally the greatest question I have ever been asked.
translation.zh: ‎这是我被问到过最好的一个问题

translation.en: All right, team, we have a plan. Let's go save the world.
translation.zh:
‎好啦 队友们 看来我们已经有计划了
‎我们去拯救世界吧

translation.en: Wait, but what about Raph?
That big jerk may be covered in goo and half alien,
translation.zh:
‎那个大混蛋也许浑身黏答答的
‎变成了半个外星人

translation.en: but he's still our brother, and I'm not giving up on him.
translation.zh:
‎但他仍然是我们的哥哥
‎我是不会放弃他的

translation.en: I'm not leaving him behind.
There's the key. Let's go.
Like Casey said, let's go!
translation.zh: ‎就像凯西说的那样 我们走！

translation.en: [Donnie] I wish my tech was working!
translation.zh: ‎真希望能用上我的科技装备！

translation.en: Usually, my cardio is jetpack-assisted.
translation.zh: ‎通常 我做有氧是有喷气背包辅助的

translation.en: I'm not getting credit for any of these steps!
translation.zh: ‎现在这些步数全都不能计分了！

translation.en: Hey, question, is it too late to join April's team?
translation.zh:
‎提问 现在加入
‎爱普利尔的小队会不会太迟？

translation.en: You two figure out how to hijack this ship.
translation.zh: ‎你们两个想办法劫持这艘飞船

translation.en: I'm gonna find Raph.
So how do we hack this thing?
translation.zh: ‎那我们要怎么侵入这玩意呢？

translation.en: [Donnie] Best guess, main console?
Unfortunately, it's ocupado.
[Mikey] Uh, new plan.
Run!
Surprise. I've come for my brother.
translation.zh: ‎惊喜 我是来找我哥哥的

translation.en: Let me guess.
Duty.
[chuckles] He said doodie.
I see you got yourself an upgrade.
You'll pay for what you have done to me!
translation.zh: ‎你将为你对我所做的事付出代价！

translation.en: This psycho routine is a little thin. Where's the character development?
translation.zh:
‎这个疯子的动作有些牵强
‎品质提升哪儿去了？

translation.en: [Casey Jones] Leo's counting on us to get to that key.
translation.zh: ‎里奥就指望我们去拿到那把钥匙了

translation.en: I think I have an idea.
Cover me!
Raph, you're coming with me, whether you like it or not.
translation.zh: ‎拉夫 不管你愿不愿意 都得跟我走

translation.en: I don't want to fight you, but I will if I have to.
translation.zh:
‎我不想跟你打架
‎但有必要的话 我不会退缩

translation.en: Oh, you will have to.
Bravo, Mikey!
There's no buttons, or computers, or anything.
translation.zh: ‎这上面没有按钮或电脑 什么都没有

translation.en: Just a lot of drippy, ooey-gooey disgustingness.
translation.zh:
‎只有一大堆湿哒哒
‎黏唧唧的恶心玩意儿

translation.en: I don't know how to hack in…
Oh God, I know what I have to do.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 我知道该怎么做了

translation.en: What?
No, I don't think I can do this.
-What are you talking about? -[gulps]
Oh no!
That's… [wretches] …so gross!
-I can't do it. -I believe in you!
-No, it's my worst nightmare. -I know.
translation.zh:
‎-这是我最可怕的噩梦
‎-我知道

translation.en: I'm doing it! I'm doing it!
Raph, I know you're in there somewhere. You've gotta snap out of this!
translation.zh:
‎拉夫 我知道你还在里面
‎你一定要挣脱出来！

translation.en: Do you feel what the power of the Krang can do?
translation.zh: ‎你感受到朗格之力的威力了吗？

translation.en: I am saving this weak planet!
translation.zh: ‎我是在拯救这个孱弱的星球！

translation.en: I am a gift!
It's not working. I need more of a connection.
translation.zh: ‎没有用 我需要更多的接触点

translation.en: Mikey, take off my battle shell.
translation.zh: ‎麦奇 把我的战斗壳脱下来

translation.en: No, you're too vulnerable with just your soft shell.
translation.zh: ‎不行 只有软壳的话你太容易受伤了

translation.en: There's no time, hurry.
Donnie? [yelps]
Mikey, I am…
a spaceship!
I'm trying to save you, you idiot!
Why do you have to make things so hard?
translation.zh: ‎你为什么要把事情变得这么复杂？

translation.en: You want to keep coming at me? Go ahead. I'm done fighting you.
translation.zh:
‎你想继续攻击我吗？
‎来吧 我不想再和你打了

translation.en: What?
No!
Finally, man and machine
entwixed in perfect bionic synergy!
translation.zh:
‎在完美的仿生协同作用下
‎融合在了一起！

translation.en: How dare you desecrate Krang's ship!
Donnie, Mikey!
I don't want to fight anymore.
I was fighting you because I didn't understand you,
translation.zh: ‎我以前和你作对 是因为我不理解你

translation.en: but now I get it.
I always figured you were mad because you didn't like the way I did things.
translation.zh:
‎我一直觉得你生气
‎是因为你不喜欢我做事的方式

translation.en: But when I see what's happening to you,
and what's happening to them…
I realized it wasn't about me.
translation.zh: ‎我意识到了这不是我一个人的事

translation.en: You didn't yell because you were mad, you yelled because you were scared.
translation.zh:
‎你大喊大叫不是因为生气
‎你大喊大叫是因为你害怕

translation.en: It's scary to be responsible for the lives you protect.
translation.zh:
‎要对自己所保护的生命负责
‎是很可怕的

translation.en: Your team… your family,
but we do it anyway because that's what it means to be a hero.
translation.zh:
‎但我们还是得那么做
‎因为这就是英雄该做的事

translation.en: If this is it, I want you to know I finally understand.
translation.zh:
‎如果这就是结局
‎我希望你知道 我终于明白了

translation.en: And I'm sorry.
Raph, Raph, there you are! Come back! Your family needs you.
translation.zh:
‎拉夫 你醒了！快回来！
‎你的家人需要你

translation.en: -Leo? -Yes!
Mikey, Donnie, we can fight this.
translation.zh: ‎麦奇 多尼 我们能够战胜这些的

translation.en: Raph's doing it for us, so we do it for him.
translation.zh:
‎拉夫正在为我们这么做
‎所以我们也要为他这样做

translation.en: That alien jerkface thinks we're weak
translation.zh: ‎那个外星混蛋认为我们不堪一击

translation.en: because he hasn't seen what we can do…
when we fight together!
It's pointless to resist Krang.
translation.zh: ‎在朗格面前 顽抗是毫无意义的

translation.en: Give up!
You will be consumed like everyone else on this pathetic planet!
translation.zh:
‎你们会和这个
‎可悲星球上的其他人一样遭到吞噬！

translation.en: -[yells] -Fat chance.
We're not like everyone else on this planet.
translation.zh: ‎我们和这个星球上的其他人不一样

translation.en: We are…
…the Teenage…
-…Mutant… -…Ninja…
…Turtles!
If this isn't the poster shot, someone's getting fired.
translation.zh:
‎如果这画面不用来做海报
‎有人就要被炒鱿鱼了

translation.en: -[thuds] -Oh, we are not done yet.
April O'Neil!
That's payback.
Keep her under that building until I bring it down.
translation.zh:
‎别让她离开那座建筑
‎直到我把它砸倒

translation.en: Yeah!
Casey, get out of there!
Commander O'Neil!
Nice shot.
Donnie's almost got the ship to the other side. I have to get to the key.
translation.zh:
‎多尼就快把飞船送回去了
‎我得去拿钥匙

translation.en: See ya.
Come in, Sensei, it's Casey. Can you hear me?
translation.zh: ‎请回答 老师 我是凯西 听得到吗？

translation.en: Come in, Sensei! Can you hear me?
Okay! Donnie!
Cowabunga!
[Mikey] Flip-o-rama!
Let's roll.
Ka-zoom!
Raph, go.
On it!
Gotcha! Don't worry, Donnie!
translation.zh: ‎抓住你们了！别担心 多尼！

translation.en: This is not a hug. It's a rescue!
Where are we? Staten Island?
Oh, gross.
So how would everyone rate that rescue experience? Unsatisfied?
translation.zh:
‎那么大家对刚刚的救援有何评价呢？
‎不满意？

translation.en: Very unsatisfied? Wish Donnie would have done it? Um-hum?
translation.zh:
‎非常不满意？
‎希望救援是由多尼完成的？

translation.en: -[grunts] -Donnie.
Leo's still up there.
Casey. Casey, come in.
Sensei, I'm here. And I've got eyes on the key.
translation.zh: ‎老师 我来了 我已经看到钥匙了

translation.en: Tell me when you're home free, and I'll pull the plug.
translation.zh:
‎等你安全回来了就告诉我
‎我会把钥匙拔掉

translation.en: Casey, listen to me.
When I get to the other side, you close that door.
translation.zh: ‎等我到了另一边 你就把门关上

translation.en: What? Sensei, no!
[Leo] Casey, it's the only way. He's too strong.
translation.zh: ‎凯西 这是唯一的办法 他太强了

translation.en: He's not gonna stay on the other side unless I keep him there.
translation.zh:
‎除非我把他困住
‎否则他是不会自己待在另一边的

translation.en: [Casey Jones] There has to be another way!
[Leo] We tried everything, Case. This is the only way.
translation.zh:
‎我们全都试过了 凯斯
‎这是唯一的方法

translation.en: Leo, please don't do this! Leo!
translation.zh: ‎里奥 拜托别这么做！里奥！

translation.en: You're one to talk, big bro. Hero moves are totally your style.
translation.zh:
‎你还好意思说呢 大哥
‎逞英雄绝对是你的作风

translation.en: Outmatched and alone, yet you persist.
translation.zh: ‎技不如人 单枪匹马 但你还在顽抗

translation.en: For what?
Honor, redemption?
Sacrifice? All meaningless.
We'll see about that.
[Casey Jones] Leo, please! I can't lose you again.
translation.zh: ‎里奥 求你了！我不能再次失去你

translation.en: [Leo] Hey, future me would be real proud of you. I'm proud of you.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 未来的我一定会以你为荣的
‎我以你为荣

translation.en: Weak words, weak actions.
translation.zh: ‎无力的言语 无力的行为

translation.en: I have forever known what you fail to understand,
translation.zh:
‎我向来都清楚一个
‎你们搞不明白的道理

translation.en: strength always prevails!
What you fail to understand is I missed on purpose.
translation.zh: ‎而你不明白的是 我是故意刺偏的

translation.en: No, enough of your little tricks.
translation.zh: ‎不 别再耍你的小把戏了

translation.en: Casey, close the portal now.
What?
No! Let go of me!
Casey, please.
You've been portal chopped.
You…
You've ruined everything!
And now… [chuckles] …my wrath will be reserved for you alone.
translation.zh: ‎现在 我的愤怒只留给你独享了

translation.en: You think you've won, you wretched little pest?
translation.zh: ‎你以为自己赢了吗 讨厌的害人精？

translation.en: Wipe that grin off your face!
Mikey, it's over.
Leo never gave up on us.
I'm not giving up on him.
Whoa. Mikey, whatever you're doing, don't stop!
translation.zh: ‎麦奇 不管你在做什么 别停下！

translation.en: We're here, Mikey. Together.
[sighs] Took you guys long enough.
[Raph] Leo!
-Leo? -Hey.
Eww! Are we in Staten Island?
-Come here! -Aww!
No pictures.
[Casey Jones] So this is "grabbing a slice"?
I don't get it.
Wait for it.
So much better than rats!
Hey, the rest of the world we saved is pretty great too.
translation.zh:
‎我们救下的这个世界
‎其他的东西也都很棒

translation.en: All right, everybody, look up here.
translation.zh: ‎好了 各位 抬头看这儿

translation.en: April, you just got a message from someone named "Cassandra."
translation.zh:
‎爱普利尔 你刚刚收到一条
‎来自“卡珊德拉”的信息

translation.en: Looks like our friend Cassandra has been busy.
translation.zh:
‎看来我们这位卡珊德拉朋友
‎一直没闲着啊

translation.en: That's my mom!
There goes the space-time continuum.
-[April laughs] -You did it, little brother.
You really did it.
I'm proud of you.
[gulps] This wasn't about me.
It was about all of us doing what needed to be done
translation.zh: ‎而是我们所有人一起 去做该做的事

translation.en: because we're heroes.
[laughs] You said "heroes."
There it is, gentlemen, our home.
translation.zh: ‎看啊 各位 我们的家园

translation.en: What a town.
Beautiful.
And if it needs defending, we'll always rise to the challenge.
translation.zh:
‎如果它需要保护
